_header: Gentleness and courtesy would be rewarded
_description: On precious stones, especially the ‘Lapis Christus’; attrib. to ‘Richardoune’ — eight 7-line stanzas

BLAdd34360.First Lines:
[G]Entilnesse and curtesie wold be rewardedOf al creatures
                    resonabe in semblable wise…
BLAdd34360.Last Lines:
…In thought worde and dede knyt al in ooneSuper hanc petram a
                    verray stidefast stone Amen

Evans,  Joan,  and  Mary Sidney Serjeantson, eds.
